name: AVFileType
desc: The uniform type identifiers for various file formats.

items.name: static let ac3: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the AC3 audio file format.

items.name: static let aifc: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the AIFC audio file format.

items.name: static let aiff: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the AIFF audio file format.

items.name: static let amr: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the adaptive multirate audio file format.

items.name: static let appleiTT: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the Apple iTT caption file format.

items.name: static let au: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the Sun/NeXT audio file format.

items.name: static let avci: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the high-efficiency image file format that contains H.264 compressed images.

items.name: static let caf: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the Core Audio Format.

items.name: static let dng: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the Adobe Digital Negative file format.

items.name: static let eac3: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the enhanced AC3 audio file format.

items.name: static let heic: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the high-efficiency image file format that contains HEVC compressed images.

items.name: static let heif: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the high-efficiency image file format that contains compressed images from any codec.

items.name: static let jpg: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the JPEG (JFIF) format.

items.name: static let m4a: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the Apple m4a audio file format.

items.name: static let m4v: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the iTunes video file format.

items.name: static let mobile3GPP: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the 3GPP file format.

items.name: static let mobile3GPP2: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the 3GPP2 file format.

items.name: static let mov: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the QuickTime movie file format.

items.name: static let mp3: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the MPEG Audio Layer III file format.

items.name: static let mp4: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the MPEG-4 file format.

items.name: static let SCC: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the Scenarist closed-caption file format.

items.name: static let tif: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the tagged image file format.

items.name: static let wav: AVFileType
items.desc: The UTI for the WAVE audio file format.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a file type with a string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a file type from its raw string value.
